meanings.definition: A nonsteroidal anti-inflammatory drug used to relieve pain and reduce inflammation.
meanings.sent1: The doctor prescribed indomethacins for my knee pain.
meanings.sent2: She bought a bottle of indomethacins at the pharmacy.
meanings.sent3: Carrying indomethacins in her bag made her feel like a walking pharmacy.
meanings.sent4: The indomethacins acted like tiny warriors fighting the inflammation in his body.
meanings.sent5: The bright red color of the indomethacins stood out against the white pills.

meanings.sent1: The nurse handed out indomethacins to the patients.
meanings.sent2: I need to buy more indomethacins for my medicine cabinet.
meanings.sent3: Having a collection of indomethacins on the shelf looked impressive.
meanings.sent4: The indomethacins lined up neatly in rows, ready to be taken.
meanings.sent5: Counting the indomethacins one by one, she realized she had enough for the month.
